root.Summary: 1: Valizadeh M, Mirzaei B, Tavallaei M, Noorani MR, Amiri M, Soroush MR, MowlaSJ. Down-regulation of TGF-b1, TGF-b receptor 2, and TGF-b-associated microRNAs, miR-20a and miR-21, in skin lesions of sulfur mustard-exposed Iranian warveterans.
